headline: How Raised 2026 Guidance And New AI Tools At PTC (PTC) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: PTC Inc. has reported past first‑quarter fiscal 2026 results to 31 December 2025, with revenue of US$685.83 million and net income of US$166.52 million, alongside new guidance for second‑quarter revenue of US$710 million to US$770 million and earnings per share of US$1.25 to US$1.87. The company also slightly raised its full‑year 2026 revenue and earnings guidance and continued rolling out AI capabilities such as Windchill AI Parts Rationalization to embed artificial intelligence across its...
